v1url.label: Url
v1url.helpText: The URL to your VersionOne instance.

v1username.label: Username
v1username.helpText: The username used to authenticate with VersionOne.

v1password.label: Password
v1password.helpText: The password used to authenticate with VersionOne.

v1project.label: Project
v1project.helpText: The OID of the VersionOne project that new defects will be assigned to.

v1source.label: Source
v1source.helpText: The OID of the Source value used for new defects.

v1assetIDField.label: V1 Asset ID Custom Field
v1assetIDField.helpText: The Zendesk custom field name for the V1 asset ID.

v1assetNumberField.label: V1 Asset Number Custom Field
v1assetNumberField.helpText: The Zendesk custom field name for the V1 asset number.

v1assetStatusField.label: V1 Asset Status Custom Field
v1assetStatusField.helpText: The Zendesk custom field name for the V1 asset status.

v1releaseNumberField.label: V1 Release Number Custom Field
v1releaseNumberField.helpText: The Zendesk custom field name for the V1 release number.
